page.title: 19SUPERNATURAL HAPPENINGS
page.content:
Mr Hodgson, curator of All Saints Church, told us that he had felt cold water running down his back when the clock struck midnight as he was changing the candles in the church.
There is reputed to be a horse and rider which haunts Tanton Bridge, between North and South Tanton Farms, where a rider was killed in an accident many years ago.
A girl who lived in Angrove Hall fell in love with a coachman. Her father disapproved, the girl later died and her ghost is supposed to haunt the site of the hall.
